title: cmd/faucet: can not start a faucet which tries to connect to a post merge private network node

Is this error related to https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/25889 ?
The light client does not work post-merge, and the faucet is essentially a light-client. We're working on getting it working again.
What you could do in the meantime to replace the light client with a fullnode (especially when your chain is light this might be a viable option)

> What you could do in the meantime to replace the light client with a fullnode (especially when your chain is light this might be a viable option)

I am having the same problem, how did you fix it?

@gianlucamazza This type of change to a full node works:

https://github.com/Sunscreen-tech/go-ethereum/pull/5
